summary: STEERING WHEEL HAS NOT BEEN CENTERED IN FRONT OF THE DRIVERS SEAT.  WHILE SEATED THE STEERING WHEEL WAS 2 1/2 INCHES TO THE RIGHT OF THE DRIVERS SEAT. THIS CONDITION FATIGUED THE DRIVERS ARMS WHILE DRIVING ANY DISTANCE.  GM CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS CONTACTED 6-19-03.  THE CONSUMER IS AFRAID THAT IF THE AIR BAG DEPLOYS IT MAY INJURE HIM INSTEAD OF SAVING HIM.  *AK   *CB   *NLM
